mapper.select: select userid, username from member where userid=#{userid} and userpwd=#{userpwd}
mapper.insert: insert into member(userid, userpwd, username, zipcode, addr, detailaddr, tel, smsok, email, emailok, regdate, lastdate) values(#{userid}, #{userpwd}, #{username}, #{zipcode}, #{addr}, #{detailaddr}, #{tel}, #{smsok}, #{email}, #{emailok}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where userid = #{userid}
